channel.title: Phonecheck's Help Thread
channel.description: [glow=red,2,300]Got a Problem with your Server?[/glow] [glow=red,2,300]Dont know how to fix it?[/glow] Then this is the thread for you! Im here to answer any of your questions to my fullest ability. Post away!

item.title: Phonecheck's Help Thread
item.dc:creator: @Phonecheck Phonecheck
item.description:
@Phonecheck wrote:

[quote=“happy2help, post:33, topic:49192”]client.java would be about npc’s dieing and npc handler isnt about teleing
im confused :([/quote]
Add a static void for teleporting in the NPCHandler.Java and then add the teleport Under the Npc dead getanimation voids.

Read full topic

item.title: Phonecheck's Help Thread
item.dc:creator: @exe626 exe626
item.description:
@exe626 wrote:

For the first part, in npc handler, add something to that npc like
ifDead = true;
Teleport X, Y
Or something like that
For part 2.
Look at crystal chest randomizer…
Just edit that to work with your dragon(JUST DON’T DELETE THE CRYSTAL CHEST) lol[br][size=1]Posted on: February 16, 2007, 05:12:20 AM[/size][hr]WAIT!
It would look more like

} if (npcs[i].npcType == ID) { 
if (misc.random2(50) == 3) { 
npcs[i].updateRequired = true; 
npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;  
npcs[i].textUpdate = "Text..";
} 
} else if (npcs[i].IsDead == true) {

Thats text though o.-
The tele part would be in client.java I believe.

Read full topic

item.title: Phonecheck's Help Thread
item.dc:creator: @lothy Lothy
item.description:
@lothy wrote:

And again lel:

lothy:

If he didn’t say in the actual tutorial topic, then chances are he doesn’t intend to tell people that part.

Basically, he only wants people who are capable to have it. So you have two options: take the time that he obviously did and figure it all out (and be grateful you have the code to work with, unlike he did), or, just don’t add it I guess. =\

Read full topic
